titleStmt.title: The concurrent testimony of the ministers in the county of VViltes, with their reverend brethren the ministers of the province of London, to the truth of Jesus Christ, and to the solemn league and covenant : as also, against the errors, heresies, and blasphemies of these times, and the toleration of them.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Stephen Bowtell at the Bible in Popeshead-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
